long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create backup image for banners too easy

When you create a banner advertisement for any vendor and platform, a requirement is create a backup image or default image, this image is used when the is visiting a page and if he don't have javascript in your browser, therefore the ads should be placed a static image, I don't know who navigate for internet without javascript active but this image is a required for all vendors and agencies. Well it is just a static image of the banner, in 72dpi, with the same dimensions of the banner, with a 1px border and less of 40k-weight. With this app you get it easy and quickly, if you have a campaign with too many ads, it can be useful for you ...
